name: Outlive (GingerNingerish)
description:
Scavenge for Firewood and Food to survive the harsh cold...

Survive the horror of those that come at night...

Outlive...

Controlls:
R - Reload
F - Heal from Food
Q - Toggle Gun
Left Click - Shoot

1 & 2 - Decide Fate

All Music, Sound, Art and Design Created by Sean Gilbert - (GingerNingerish)
